pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Flower Seeds, 2 Pointed Dripstone, 1 Red Dye, 1 Empty Upgrade Packet, 175 Sun value.

pages.title: Sun Producer
pages.text: $(#25228d)Vampire Flowers suck Sun out of Zombies, damaging them directly.

text: $(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Bites a Zombie directly, ignoring gear(or bite Shield/Cover), then Sucks it, dropping Small Sun and Stunning for 5s on damage. Unsuckable if they are Big or above, or an Obstacle.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Being a summer goth takes commitment. Especially when you're a Plant that produces sun for a living.
